TEXT.TITLE: MARBLE FINANCIAL CORP <MRBL> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 26 cts vs not given Oper net 866,000 vs 480,000 NOTE: 1987 net excludes 157,000 dlr gain from termination of pension plan. Company went public in August 1986. Reuter
